title: Github Sponsors
content: Becoming a sponsor on Github gives you the options of monthly or one-time donations.

title: Liberapay
content: Support the project by donating on Liberapay at weekly, monthly, or yearly intervals.

title: PayPal Donation
content: Choose between a monthly and one-time donation with PayPal.

title: Buy a Shirt
content: Get yourself a Feathers UI t-shirt or hoodie. Many colors and styles available â€” in both men's and women's sizes.
